page.title: 16RASHFIELD SCHOOL.
page.content: Rashfield School dinners are not made in this school but come from Sandbank Primary School which is 2 miles away.They are delivered in containers and put in a warming cupboard then served to us at 12.15pm.Some people bring packed lunches. One in every three children at our school do not belong to our schools catchment area.Parents have been able to do this since 1980 when the Parents Charter came into force allowing parents to choose which school they wanted their children to go to. Rashfield School does not have any uniform but sweatshirts and teeshirts with the school motto on it are optional.The school motto is { {AIM HIGH. }
